title: Ozry
author: Ozry
content: turtle.fan is a SocialFi platform on Polygon that lets you $SHELL your X friends and get shelled ! Now enter your X friend's secret room and enjoy its content! Content will be shared in the format of posts wherein all holders will be able to interact with each other.Don't know what your X friend's secret room is about? Check out his biography and see if it suits you, else just look for new X friends in the users by content categories bar. Also, turtle.fan offers low transactions costs, a lower burden to become a $SHELL holder, royalties for both the users, a.k.a the creators, and their $SHELL holders, features such as a live $SHELL graph and thanks to WalletConnect, it never stores users' private key.We are in Beta and currently have a few dozens of testers that tip us on how to make it a better UX.We reward cool feedbacks! => want to share your thoughts? Head to https://www.turtle.fan/, onboard and hit us on X on @turtlefanHQ!✅ Contract verified.✅ Docs and github available.✅ Listed on DappRadar, alpha growth, QuestN and Smoothie.image proxies :https://i.ibb.co/S6pRW60/t1.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/BCpwCKx/t2.png
